column3: As the prosecution has failed to prove its case beyond reasonable doubt,

column1: there  is  no  necessity  to  consider  the  other  grounds  of  appeal  argued    by  the

column3: Therefore,  we  allow  the  appeal  and  set  aside  the  conviction  and  the

column1: sentence and acquit the appellant from both charges.

column3: JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
